message.body: I wish you would have been at school today. Myrriah was wearing a bindi because her sacred pregnancy class did belly dancing. She also had roses around that she had used on an alter. It was totally totally her. Also she is so white. I think she's metal th
Ha! I agree. how cute is she. I remember thinking she had a weep way back when stephanie t treated her in class. She also came up 2 me and said she could
relate 2 the metal stuff i was talking abt in mary ellen's class..
Chad Bong has the best weep. He is shiny white too. Last night he told me he is the worlds slowest needles because he is trying to get into the "tiniest most perfect spaces". I love him!!
His needling reminds me of Thomasin's tiny precise penmanship!!

She does seem griefy often. She's kind of full of longing which I think is related to grief. When Laura diagnosed me as metal not wood she said: I don't hear anger, I hear disappointment. That makes so much sense to me now. :)
